hero.title: Find your device no matter where it is.
hero.characteristics: The most versatile geolocation solution on the market
hero.text: Discover why millions of users trust QuickGeo for their navigation needs

cards.title: Universal Support
cards.paragraph: Access from any device regardless of brand or operating system — the platform adapts to offer you the best experience.

cards.title: Accurate Location
cards.paragraph: Find any number accurately within seconds from anywhere. Works with all mobile networks regardless of the carrier.

cards.title: No Installation Required
cards.paragraph: Use the service instantly without downloading anything or setting up your device. Just enter the number and get the information immediately.

cards.title: Guaranteed Privacy
cards.paragraph: Your security is our priority — you browse completely anonymously without tracking, so you can use the service with full confidence.

screenImg.title: Your control center for locating devices
screenImg.paragraph: With your active subscription, you can locate multiple devices from a single, easy-to-use interface.

testimonials.title: We have helped thousands of people around the world

people.story: I left a coffee shop and forgot my phone. Thanks to the app, I saw it was still there. I went back quickly and recovered it without any problem. Without geolocation, I would have lost it forever.
people.name: Marguie

people.story: My daughter strayed from the route to school. With just one click on the app, I saw where she was and went to get her. Knowing her real-time location gave us complete peace of mind.
people.name: Ryan

people.story: After an event, I couldn't remember where I had parked. I used the app and within seconds, I had the exact location of my car. It was a lifesaver.
people.name: Mark

people.story: My father got injured while hiking. Since he had the app active, we were able to find out where he was and send help quickly. It was crucial for getting him medical attention in time.
people.name: Darren and Julie

people.story: In my business, clients can now see where their delivery is in real time. Everything is clearer, more reliable, and more professional thanks to geolocation.
people.name: Brian

testimonials.title2: Trust and Precision on a Global Scale
testimonials.subtitle: Join today and take your geolocation to the next level

howItWork.title: How It Works?
howItWork.subtitle: Discover how we locate your phone.

functions.title: Search a phone number
functions.paragraph: Our technology starts locating and identifying the associated phone.

functions.title: Request a precise location
functions.paragraph: We send a text message to the target phone to locate it. This message is anonymous by default, but you can customize it to increase the chances of success.

functions.title: Get your results
functions.paragraph: You will be automatically informed with the address as soon as the recipient confirms their location.

questions.title: FAQs
questions.subtitle: Still have questions?
questions.paragraph: Our team is here to help — ask us anything.

accordion.title: Is it illegal to locate a third party?
accordion.paragraph: QuickGeo is completely legal and complies with CNIL recommendations. QuickGeo cannot operate without the third party's consent for geolocation.

accordion.title: What types of phones are compatible?
accordion.paragraph: QuickGeo works on all phones with an internet connection.

accordion.title: How accurate is QuickGeo?
accordion.paragraph: Our service provides you with the exact location with an accuracy between 1 and 6 meters.

accordion.title: How long does it take?
accordion.paragraph: The third party will receive a text message within 2 minutes, and you will be notified immediately after they give their consent to be geolocated.

accordion2.title: Does QuickGeo work if the third party's phone is turned off?
accordion2.paragraph: The third party’s phone must be turned on for tracking to work. However, as soon as the phone is switched back on, geolocation messages will be received.

accordion2.title: How much does mobile phone geolocation cost?
accordion2.paragraph: The third party’s phone must be turned on for tracking to work. However, as soon as the phone is switched back on, geolocation messages will be received.

accordion2.title: Is my information secure?
accordion2.paragraph: Your anonymity is important to us. The third party’s geographic location is sent via a secure TLS (Transport Layer Security) protocol and is not visible to anyone else. Your personal information and identity are not shared with anyone.

accordion2.title: How can I cancel my subscription?
accordion2.paragraph: The subscription is non-binding and can be canceled at any time by clicking the button below and following the on-screen instructions.

bannerLocate.title: Locate Any Phone Now
bannerLocate.subtitle: Try our solution with unlimited access for 24 hours for just €0.50. After your trial period, you can choose to stay subscribed for €47.90 per month.

footer.title: Quick Links
footer.paragraph: Locate your device accurately and reliably, no matter the country or network.

prices.title: Pricing
prices.text: Take advantage of our 24-hour trial offer to discover our service.
prices.subtitle: Trial Offer

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.text: Quickly get the answers you need with our FAQs.

unsubscribe.span: We're sorry to see you go
unsubscribe.title: Cancel Subscription
unsubscribe.paragraph: To unsubscribe from our services, simply enter the email address associated with your account in the field below and click the 'Unsubscribe' button.
unsubscribe.label: Email
unsubscribe.text: If you've forgotten the email associated with your account, please send us a message at contact@quickgeo.mobi with the last 4 digits of your credit card, and we will process your cancellation. We usually respond within 24 hours.
